official_title: To suspend until January 1, 1997, the duty on 3R-alpha(R*),4-beta---4-(acetyloxy)-3- 1- (1,1- dimethyl ethyl) dimethylsily?oxy?ethyl?-2-azetidinone, also known as aceotoxy azetidinone.

summary.text: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 1996, the duty on (3R-(3-alpha (R *), 4-beta))-4-(acetyloxy-3-(1-(((1,1-dimethyl ethyl) dimethylsilyl) oxy)ethyl)-2-azetidinone (also known as acetoxy azetidinone).

titles.title: To suspend until January 1, 1997, the duty on 3R-alpha(R*),4-beta---4-(acetyloxy)-3- 1- (1,1- dimethyl ethyl) dimethylsily?oxy?ethyl?-2-azetidinone, also known as aceotoxy azetidinone.
